books.author: by Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the Union general of the Civil War and two-term president of the United States.
books.name: GRANT

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: Major events and battles during the Revolutionary War are told from several perspectives.
books.name: KILLING ENGLAND

books.author: by Hillary Clinton
books.description: An inside look at her campaign, mistakes she made, outside forces that affected the outcome and how she recovered in its aftermath.
books.name: WHAT HAPPENED

books.author: by Ta-Nehisi Coates
books.description: A series of essays that cover each year of the Obama administration, the writer's own journey and the echoes of American history in modern times.
books.name: WE WERE EIGHT YEARS IN POWER

books.author: by Neil deGrasse Tyson
books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the laws that govern the universe.
books.name: ASTROPHYSICS FOR PEOPLE IN A HURRY

books.author: by J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of the white working class through the story of his own childhood.
books.name: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: by Esther Perel
books.description: An overview of the causes of infidelity and potential positive outcomes.
books.name: THE STATE OF AFFAIRS

books.author: by Katy Tur
books.description: The NBC News correspondent describes her work covering the 2016 campaign of the Republican nominee for president and his behavior toward her.
books.name: UNBELIEVABLE

books.author: edited by Bandy X. Lee
books.description: 27 psychiatrists and mental health experts give their assessments of the president.
books.name: THE DANGEROUS CASE OF DONALD TRUMP

books.author: by Russell Brand
books.description: The actor and comedian describes his various addictions and how he was able to move away from them.
books.name: RECOVERY

books.author: by Laura Ingraham
books.description: The conservative radio host gives historical perspective to President Donald J. Trump's agenda.
books.name: BILLIONAIRE AT THE BARRICADES

books.author: by Jeannette Walls
books.description: The author recalls a bizarre childhood. Originally published in 2005 and the basis of the movie.
books.name: THE GLASS CASTLE

books.author: by Van Jones
books.description: A look at the failures of both major political parties and a call for bipartisan efforts to solve current problems.
books.name: BEYOND THE MESSY TRUTH

books.author: by Jonathan Cahn
books.description: Ancient figures from the Middle East are used to explain the rise and fall of contemporary leaders and events.
books.name: THE PARADIGM

books.author: by Eric Metaxas
books.description: A biography of the monk whose writings sparked the Protestant Reformation.
books.name: MARTIN LUTHER
